meaningMnemonic: You know that 乗り has something to do with <kanji>riding</kanji> and that 物 is a <kanji>thing</kanji>. So what is a "riding thing?" Nowadays, at least, that would be a <vocabulary>vehicle</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi readings for both kanji, but you know them both now, so you should be able to read this too!
